page.title: 10WICK FARM,DITCHLING
page.content: Take a walk over the Downs in June and you'll find many farms,small villages and many wild flowers and crops. The owner of Wick Farm started up a vineyard three year's ago,which has grown over several acres. The owner has a good business with his wine crops,with names such as Miller,Thurgall and Rishensteiner. The owner has several animals on Wick Farm which is seperate from the vineyard.You will be able to buy wine by the bottle. The vineyard produced 8 thousand bottles in 1983,and in 1984, 24 thousand bottles. The main buyer's are hotels, restaurants and people who visit the vineyard.The sucess of the vineyard comes from the sort of soil which is lower chalk at the top and green sand at the bottom.{
